author: Amy Molloy
title: Why I put myself through a Reddit 'roast'
text: Internet Why I put myself through a Reddit 'roast' Amy Molloy posted a picture of herself on Reddit and encouraged users to bully her for 48 hours. Here is how she found the experience... 'An unavoidable, unsavoury side effect of the internet, an astonishing 40 per cent of online users have experienced bullying, harassment and intimidation' By Amy Molloy
